price: Oya! Mu by’ukuri igitabo cy’abakora ibyiza (cyanditsemo ibikorwa byabo) gishyinguwe mu bubiko bwabugenewe bwitwa Iliyyuuna.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-abrāri lafī ʿilliyyīna
